txt.en: Return to Bráthi with the crystals that you have mined
Bráthi can be found at Zidir-nesad, The Steepset.\n\nYou should return to Bráthi with the crystals that you have mined.
'I have recently discovered a new crystal deposit in Gundabad. These crystals are rare and should be mined before they are collected or destroyed by our enemies. Will you mine these crystals for me?'
Bráthi the Master Prospector is in search of rare treasures in Gundabad.
Crystals can be found throughout Gundabad.\n\nYou should mine crystals for Bráthi.
'Thank you! These crystals are indeed rare and a beauty to behold! What wonders are in Gundabad!'
